snippet.title: Super Mario Kart Custom Tracks - Hack Trailers
snippet.description:
Hello all! Today I'd like to announce some big news regarding my SMK hack! I've been teaming up with Cocatriz, which is a pro SMK player from Europe which has provided invaluable feedback on how to make the tracks better! This is a dual trailer showing first my hack, then his.

====================
Super Mario Kart: Remix (Name not final) is a fully featured SMK hack, including all new 20 tracks to race on! plus 4 new battle arenas.


The hack includes new and revamped themes, as well as new graphics overall for a majority of the game being changed to look different!
====================

Super Mario Kart 20XX - Enhanced Editon is an improvement hack of the already out SMK 20XX. This new version will included modified and new tracks, all tracks playable on NTSC FULL SPEED 150cc as well as new background themes to go along with the new changes.
====================

You can follow Cocatriz here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCR9ZPN0v1rI_Nzob6LWyFRg
